item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
As a Video Editor at Shownmedia, you will play a crucial role in shaping the visual impact of our direct-to-consumer ad campaigns on platforms like TikTok and Meta. This position involves working closely with our creative team to edit and assemble recorded footage into a finished project that matches the Creative Strategist’s vision and is suitable for advertising. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of editing software, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to effectively tell a story through video. You will be responsible for editing video content that is engaging, visually appealing, and on-brand, ensuring that it drives viewer engagement and meets the marketing objectives of our clients.

Duties:
- Edit video footage to create high-quality and engaging content
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects
- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running of the final product
- Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry's best practices to maximize efficiency

Requirements:
- Able to work in Eastern Time Zone.
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role - Proficient in using film editing software such as Adobe Premiere, Adobe After Effects, and Adobe Creative Suite
- Strong understanding of post-production techniques including color grading, audio mixing, and typography
- Excellent attention to detail with a creative mind and storytelling skills
- Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively with a team.
- Strong time management skills to meet project deadlines If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills to bring stories to life through visual content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team of talented professionals and contribute to creating compelling videos that captivate audiences.

Job Type: Full-time

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Content Strategist for Influencers/content creators - Upwork
item.description:
We are an Influencer and Content Agency seeking a passionate and creative individual with expertise in short-form content, hooks, and viral trends. Experience in managing Instagram accounts and using Capcut is preferred.

Responsibilities:

Research and identify trends within specific niches on Instagram and analyze what makes content viral.
Develop content ideas tailored to our clients' brands and preferences.
Work alongside content creators and influencers to craft compelling short-form content ideas.
Communicate with clients to assist and update their content plans.
Manage clients' main Instagram profiles.
Edit client content with innovative hooks and creative ideas using Capcut or other editing apps, or assist our editors with editing or caption ideas for the videos.
Compensation:

Starting salary: €2500 per month, which may vary depending on your qualifications and experience. Promotions and salary increases will always be on the table in the future.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in creating and managing short-form content.
Strong understanding of what makes content go viral.
Proficiency in using Capcut and other editing tools.
Experience working with content creators or influencers is highly desirable.
If you're excited about creating impactful content and helping brands thrive on social media, we'd love to hear from you!

Additional Application Instructions
Please fill out the form, and we will contact you via Email or Telegram. Looking forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $2,500
Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:04 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Strategy, Digital Marketing Strategy, Content Creation, Communications, Market Research, Marketing Strategy, Instagram Marketing, TikTok Marketing, Content Editing
Skills: Content Strategy, Digital Marketing Strategy, Content Creation, Communications, Market Research, Marketing Strategy, Instagram Marketing, TikTok Marketing, Content Editing
Country: Iceland
click to apply

item.description:
Position: Short form video editor

Style: TikTok/Reels in the Alex Hormozi/Iman Gadzi style with captions, edits, and animations

Compensation: $20/video (MINIMUM of 30 videos/month, ideally 90/month in the future)

I work for a social media growth agency and we are trying to help clients DOMINATE social media, which means we need editors who are ready to make NEXT-LEVEL content. We need someone who can edit videos that are so mesmerizing and engaging that viewers CAN'T look away.

item.title: Content Producer/Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hi everyone,

I'm looking for a talented Content Producer/Editor to help me create and edit creatives for multiple e-commerce brands. Our goal is to produce creative and viral content that generates organic reach and boosts our sales. Long-term, I’m seeking a partner, not just a freelancer for individual projects.

Your tasks will include editing raw material that I provide, as well as independently shooting and editing videos with the products I send you (you don’t need to show your face). You will develop creative content that captures viral trends and create engaging ad content for our campaigns. Together, we'll develop content strategies and analyze performance to maximize reach and sales.

I’m looking for someone with experience in creating and editing video and image content, strong skills in using software like Adobe Premiere, After Effects, and Photoshop, marketing expertise, and a knack for viral content. It’s important that you have the necessary equipment: a camera or a modern phone, lighting, and a computer for editing.

We need creatives for both organic reach and ads.


Posted On: July 01, 2024 14:53 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Short Video Ad, Content Writing, Video Production, Video Editing, English
Skills: Video Commercial, Short Video Ad, Content Writing, Video Production, Video Editing, English
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

item.title: Product video- Footage Only - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, there!

We are an advertising agency from China. We have many shooting orders from our clients. Most of the videos will be used on the Amazon product page. If you have an interest in making videos and are good at it, please be free to let me know!

Requirement:
1. Create footage for our client's product
2. Use a professional camera to make videos.
3. Know how to make a great video
4. Need model in the video, no gender limit
5. Love to communicate and finish work effectively

Note:
We will provide the script, you don't need to edit the videos, just follow the script to finish the footage, then we will edit by ourselves

If you have interest, please let me know. And we also have many products that need to film videos, not just this one, if you would like to join us, you can send me a video you have done before, so I can know if you are the one we are looking for. If we have a good start, we can build a long-term cooperation

Budget: $100
Posted On: July 01, 2024 14:51 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

2. Use a professional camera to make videos.
3. Know how to make a great video
4. Need model in the video, no gender limit
5. Love to communicate and finish work effectively

Note:
We will provide the script, you don't need to edit the videos, just follow the script to finish the footage, then we will edit by ourselves

If you have interest, please let me know. And we also have many products that need to film videos, not just this one, if you would like to join us, you can send me a video you have done before, so I can know if you are the one we are looking for. If we have a good start, we can build a long-term cooperation

item.title: Seeking Talented Designer for Multipage Content and Instagram Reels Templates for Woandercopia - Upwork
item.description:
Hello talented designers,

I am looking for an experienced and creative graphic designer to create two distinct styles of multipage content templates and two Instagram reels templates for my Instagram page, Woandercopia. These templates will be used for various types of content, such as carousel posts, guides, stories, and reels.

Project Requirements:

1. Multipage Content Templates:

   - Template Style:
     - Clean and professional design.
     - Suitable for informational carousel posts, educational guides, and formal story sequences.
     - Consistent layout for title slide, content slides, and conclusion slide.
     - Use of brand colors, fonts, and elements.
     - Easy to edit and customize in Adobe Illustrator or Canva.
     - Creative and modern design.
     - Suitable for engaging carousel posts, interactive guides, and vibrant story sequences.
     - Eye-catching title slide, interactive content slides, and conclusion slide.
     - Use of vibrant colors, unique fonts, and creative elements.
     

2. Instagram Reels Templates:

   - Reels Template 1:
     - Fashioned like a Wikipedia article come to life.
     - Suitable for educational storytelling.
     - Engaging animations and transitions to highlight key points.
     - Use of brand colors, fonts, and elements.
     - Easy to edit and customize in Adobe Premiere Pro or After Effects.

   - Reels Template 2:
     - Designed for quick news updates.
     - Dynamic and attention-grabbing layout.
     - Use of vibrant colors, bold fonts, and fast-paced transitions.
     - Easy to edit and customize in Adobe Premiere Pro or After Effects.

Deliverables:
- Editable files in Adobe Illustrator, Canva, Adobe Premiere Pro, and/or After Effects formats.
- High-resolution images and video files of each template.
- Any associated fonts or graphic elements used in the design.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience in creating content templates for social media, especially Instagram.
- Strong portfolio showcasing similar projects.
- Proficiency in Adobe Illustrator, Canva, Adobe Premiere Pro, and After Effects.
- Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.

**How to Apply:**
- Provide a brief overview of your experience and why you are the right fit for this project.
- Include samples of your previous work, particularly social media content and reels templates.
- Mention your estimated turnaround time for this project.

I am excited to see your proposals and look forward to working with a talented designer to bring these templates to life. If you have any questions, please feel free to ask.

Thank you!



Posted On: July 01, 2024 14:47 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Education, Instagram, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Infographic, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Imagery
Skills: Education, Instagram, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Infographic, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Imagery
Country: BHS
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Video/Audio Editor & Marketer for Mental Health Practice - Upwork
item.description:
Podcast Video/Audio Editor & Marketer for Mental Health Practice

Expert in Podcasts? Video/ Audio Editing? Want to help others?

Holistic Consultation, a group mental health private practice located in Columbus, Ohio is looking for a short-term expert to help edit and market our upcoming podcast, “Let’s Unpack That”.

Candidate must be independent, driven, collaborative, and enhance our dedicated, connected, and positive minded staff.

Qualifications and Skills:
• Several years’ experience working with podcasts, specifically video editing, audio editing, podcast marketing, shorts/reels, podcast into, outro and trailers.
• Strong organization, detail orientation and communication skills
• Proficient with technology and ability to learn new systems as needed
• Proven reliability, adaptability and professionalism
• Able to work independently on tasks assigned
• Prior experience in a mental health environment a plus

This position reports to the Executive Director is available either fully remote or at our Columbus, OH based office. Candidate will be contractor status.


Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00

item.title: London Based Male UGC Creators needed for a Gaming Project - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking London-based talent to create a UGC video for a popular gaming client. Creators need to have a pronounced British accent and samples of previous UGC work.

The duration of the video is expected to be between 30-45 seconds. Producing the videos requires very little preparation and only a smartphone, so it should be just a matter of minutes. Production will not be providing cameras or camerapersons. Shooting with a current smartphone and tripod is sufficient.

The video will be posted on social networks and other online platforms. Actors/creators will not have to edit or promote the video.

You will be required to sign a release agreement granting us permission to use these assets.

About Rocketship HQ: We're a boutique growth marketing firm based in New York & Estonia. We work with some of the leading mobile apps in the world today.

Budget: $100

item.title: Grab Clips From A Popular Gaming Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there! I'm a popular video creator on YouTube with 1,800,000 subscribers. My content revolves around the well-known game "Minecraft".

I'm looking for an editor who wants experience with working with a big creator. The tasks for this job are simple: provide me with content for IG Reels + TikTok by grabbing clips from my latest YouTube videos. You will also be in charge of uploading them on those 2 mentioned social media accounts.

I’m looking for around 3-5 clips uploaded per week (so I can post each day). And I will pay you $50 per week!

Simple job for some extra money, and the work itself is quite fun! All you have to do is watch my Minecraft videos and collect clips of the funny or cool moments! You can easily get an entire week's worth of content in 1-2 hours maximum.

***PLEASE HAVE AN UNDERSTANDING OF THE GAME*** If you don't watch/play Minecraft, it might be hard to identify what is worth clipping!

That being said, I hope we can work together! Excited to meet you!

Budget: $50
Posted On: July 01, 2024 14:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a Creative Strategist for our Ecom Brand! - Upwork
item.description:
For our fast-growing e-commerce brand, we are looking for a creative strategist. We need a top-tier professional who excels in storytelling, can generate innovative ideas, and transform them into scripts for our paid advertisements.

What you will be doing:
- Analyzing competitors and our target audience to come up with new angles and creative ideas.
- Translating these ideas into short VSL (Video Sales Letter) scripts for content creators or our video editor to produce videos, either through filming or AI-generated content.
- Collaborating closely with video editors and content creators to ensure high-quality final results.

We operate in the pain relief niche, selling small massage devices primarily in the Dutch market, with plans to expand to other countries.

Optional: If you have the ability to create some content yourself for B-roll footage, that's a plus.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$36.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 14:21 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Marketing Strategy, Copywriting, Storytelling, Content Writing, Social Media Marketing, Creative Writing, Brand Strategy, Branding, Brand Positioning, Brand Identity

item.title: Head Of Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
SNP Enterprises is looking for a Head Of Video Editing

This position would require you to review all edits, and work from our current video editing team (team of 15) for now, and manage them.

This would entail being up to industry standards, making sure our edits are spot on, grammar mistakes, creativity, speed, trendy songs, everything.

We're looking for somebody who is an amazing video editor that has had great performance with short form content and is looking to transition in less editing and more leadership.

What you'll do:

- Manage a full team of short form editors
- Make sure all clips are grammatically correct
- Reviewing editing styles & creativity & making sure we're up to standards
- Making suggestions for every clip and sending it to the editors
- Training on video editing, making sure they have everything they need in order to become a successful video editor with us

Again, you would not edit any actual clips yourself, just manage.

Salary:

$1,000 + $500 performance bonus, this bonus is paid out by making sure editors hit their KPI's (views, minimum clips per day, style necessary for clients, minimal amount of tweaks)

How to apply:

1. Send us your previous video editing work for short-form content
2. Send us a quick question on why you're the right person for this role

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: July 01, 2024 14:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Serbia
click to apply

item.title: Local Photographer/Videographer for Digital Content - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for local talent ASAP to produce photo/video content (website, ads, social media) to promote my agency and podcast. The projects, in priority order below, could easily become a longer-term partnership with the potential to consider additional social media management projects.

Must Haves:
*Local candidates in the DC, MD, VA area (shooting will take place in my home in Sterling, VA)
*Equipment: Must be provided by the photographer/videographer (high-resolution images, 4K video, special lighting, etc.).
*Skilled in photography, videography, direction & editing
*Experience creating content for YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram
*Knowledge of popular video trends
Preferable:
*Able to start this Weds, July 3rd
*Creative Strategy
*Content/Digital Media creation
*Social Media Management

Digital Content (immediate needs):
*Headshots
*Candid/Lifestyle
*Interior design
Videos (including editing):
*advertisement & promo
*product demo
*long-form YouTube
*short-form for TikTok/Instagram

Please provide a portfolio or examples and reviews of your previous work, especially any similar projects. Specify your availability over the next 2 weeks and whether you prefer an hourly rate or a fixed price.

*advertisement & promo
*product demo
*long-form YouTube
*short-form for TikTok/Instagram

Please provide a portfolio or examples and reviews of your previous work, especially any similar projects. Specify your availability over the next 2 weeks and whether you prefer an hourly rate or a fixed price.

item.title: UGC videos for product video ads (girls) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a UGC content creator to produce high-quality video ads (each of under 60 seconds) for 4 products in the skin care and wellness industry. Products like face serum, face mask, breast oil, Weight gainer, libido booster,  bum and back cream. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, editing, and delivering engaging video content that highlights the benefits and features of our products. This role requires a strong understanding of UGC trends and the ability to create content that resonates with our target audience.

    Key skills:
    - Video production
    - Video editing
    - Storyboarding
    - Content ideation
    - Creative direction
    - Knowledge of skin care and wellness industry

    Time frame: Under 60 Second


Budget: $50

Category: Video Production
